changePasswordDesc: Update your password here. It's a good practice to use a strong, unique password.
passwordChangedSuccessDesc: You can now use your new password to log in.
passwordsDoNotMatch: The new passwords do not match.
noWorkoutPlanned: No workout planned for this day.
deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete '{exerciseName}'?
deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone and will remove the exercise from all past and future workouts.
deleteWorkoutExerciseConfirmation: Are you sure you want to remove '{exerciseName}' from this workout?
noWorkoutDataForVolume: No workout data with weight recorded for this period yet. Add weight to your exercises to see progress.
descriptionPlaceholder: e.g., A full body compound exercise.
benchPressDescription: Lay on a flat bench, lower a barbell to your chest, and press it back up.
dumbbellFlyesDescription: Lay on a bench with dumbbells, open your arms wide, and bring them back together over your chest.
pushupsDescription: Start in a plank position, lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor, and push back up.
pullupsDescription: Hang from a bar with an overhand grip and pull your body up until your chin is over the bar.
bentoverRowsDescription: Bend at your hips and knees, holding a barbell, and pull it towards your stomach.
deadliftsDescription: Lift a loaded barbell off the floor to a standing position, then lower it back down.
squatsDescription: Lower your hips from a standing position and then stand back up.
legPressDescription: Push a weight away from you using your legs on a leg press machine.
lungesDescription: Step forward with one leg and lower your hips until both knees are bent at a 90-degree angle.
overheadPressDescription: Press a barbell or dumbbells from your shoulders up over your head.
lateralRaisesDescription: Raise dumbbells out to your sides up to shoulder level.
bicepCurlsDescription: Curl dumbbells or a barbell up towards your shoulders, working your biceps.
tricepDipsDescription: Using parallel bars or a bench, lower and push up your body with your triceps.
plankDescription: Hold a push-up position, keeping your body in a straight line.
crunchesDescription: Lie on your back and lift your upper body towards your knees.
loginToContinue: Login or create an account to continue
invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
passwordTooShort: Password must be at least {min} characters.
firebaseNotConfigured: Firebase is not configured. Authentication is disabled.
userExistsPasswordIncorrect: Incorrect email or password. Please try again.
incorrectCurrentPassword: The current password is not correct.
emailAlreadyInUse: An account with this email already exists.
noWorkoutOnThisDay: No workout recorded for this day.
pasteWorkoutConfirmation: This day already has a workout. Do you want to replace it with the copied workout?
noDataToExport: No data found for the selected date range.
newPasswordCannotBeSame: New password cannot be the same as the current password.
importDataDescription: If you have local data saved as a JSON file, you can import it here to restore it.
invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please select a .json file.
invalidJsonFormat: File is not a valid JSON. Please check the file content.
fileReadError: There was an error reading the file.
importFailed: The data import failed. Please check the console for more details.
notLoggedIn: You must be logged in to import data.
